name: Options Orders Test
description: Test case for retrieving options order history through agent interaction

parts.text: Show me my recent options order history.

Here is your recent options order history:

**Recent Options Orders:**

*

**Options Order Information:**
- **Direction:** Whether you bought (long) or sold (short) the option
- **Strike Price:** The exercise price of the option
- **Expiration:** When the option expires
- **Premium:** The price paid/received per contract
- **Quantity:** Number of contracts

This shows your actual options trading history from your Robinhood account.
